detectors.description:

	State variables written after the call(s):

detectors.description:
VestingContract.releaseToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VestingContract__27.sol#354-373) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- vestingStartTime == 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VestingContract__27.sol#358)
	- block.timestamp >= vestingStartTime + (index * releaseInterval) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VestingContract__27.sol#365)
